name: CreateCsatSurvey
description:
Create a new CSAT survey in Freshservice.

This tool is used to create a new Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) survey in Freshservice. Call this tool when you need to set up a survey to gather customer feedback.

parameters.name: csat_survey_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the CSAT Survey to be created. Includes ID, name, activation state, trigger event, survey question, option ordering, response options, and timestamps.

id.description: Unique identifier of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

active.description: State of the survey. For an activated survey, active = true. For a deactivated survey, active = false.

survey_trigger_event.description: Field to capture when the survey should be sent.

question.description: Question that will be asked to the requester to capture the service experience

order_of_options.description: Gradient order of the options displayed

text.description: Option text that will be displayed to the requester. E.g. Fantastic, Neutral, Awful.

follow_up_question.description: Follow-up question that will asked when the requester responds with the current option.

option_1.description: Response Options of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

text.description: Option text that will be displayed to the requester. E.g. Fantastic, Neutral, Awful.

follow_up_question.description: Follow-up question that will asked when the requester responds with the current option.

option_2.description: Response Options of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

text.description: Option text that will be displayed to the requester. E.g. Fantastic, Neutral, Awful.

follow_up_question.description: Follow-up question that will asked when the requester responds with the current option.

option_3.description: Response Options of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

option_4.description: Response Options of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

follow_up_question.description: Follow-up question that will asked when the requester responds with the current option.

option_5.description: Response Options of the Customer Satisfaction Survey

thank_you_message.description: The final \"Thank you\" message that gets displayed to the requester upon completion of the survey

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the agent who last modified this survey

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the survey was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the survey was last modified

value_schema.description: CSAT Survey that needs to be created
